Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Potion \Po"tion\, n. [L. potio, from potare to drink: cf. F. potion. See {Poison}.] A draught; a dose; usually, a draught or dose of a liquid medicine. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Potion \Po"tion\, v. t. To drug. [Obs.] --Speed. [1913 Webster]
potion n : a medicinal or magical or poisonous beverage
